participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and enthusiastic, enjoys trying new things and staying active.
participant_1.background: I like to eat sushi when I'm not at the archery center. I have a bicycle. I enjoy the food network and HGTV while I'm on my diet. I have been exposed to a variety of cultures and lifestyles due to my upbringing. I live in the US and work out in my home gym every day to stay fit.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, enjoys music and spending time with family.
participant_2.background: I prefer to listen to my own music on my own terms. I have a system for doing laundry that works well for me. I like to listen to the band Red Hot Chili Peppers to remember my dad. I volunteer in my son's boy scout troop. I freeze up in social situations.

content.text: Hey! How's your day going so far?
It's going well so far, thanks for asking! Yours?
It's going good, just got back from the archery center.
Wow, that sounds fun! Do you do it often?
Yeah, I try to go at least once a week. I really enjoy it.
I've never tried archery before, but it sounds like it's something I'd enjoy.
It's a lot of fun! And it's a great way to get exercise.
I'm definitely going to have to give it a try sometime.
You should! It's really easy to get into.
So what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch a lot of TV. I'm a big fan of Food Network and HGTV.
I love watching Food Network too! I'm always looking for new recipes to try.
Me too! I'm trying to get into cooking more.
It's a lot of fun, and it's really rewarding to make a delicious meal.
I know, right? I just made sushi for the first time the other day.
Wow, that's awesome! I've never made sushi before.
It's not too hard, you should try it sometime!
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
